The Legendary Nakov

Nakov is a famous programmer genius billionaire playboy philantropist, known for his inovative education system, which inspired milions of young people to help each other and share their knowledge. The system was introduced via the Software University, which triggered the creation of private universities not only in the IT area, but in almost every other. Nakov's idea redefined education and turned him into a legend. It also made him insanely rich. Somehow. What's important is the money, unlocked his extravagant sexual tastes. Now he can afford everything. There's a rumour he owns a Red Room full of sex toys, where he leads young innocent women (only with their written agreement :).

If you want an unforgetable experience, you can apply for a meeting with the brilliant and passionate Nakov! Your only task is to fill the apply form.
